description.value:
Level 3 Illusion

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: 120 feet

Components: S, M (a pinch of confetti)

Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

You create a twisting pattern of colors in a 30-foot Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube within range. The pattern appears for a moment and vanishes. Each creature in the area who can see the pattern must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed|XPHB condition for the duration. While Charmed|XPHB, the creature has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition and a Speed|XPHB of 0. The spell ends for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.
